final_mermaid_code:
graph TB
    subgraph Pool
        A[Claim received] --> B[Create claim]
        B --> C{XORGateway}
        C -->|claim to be accepted| D[Record claim]
        D --> E[Decide on claim]
        E --> F{XORGateway}
        F -->|claim to be accepted| G[Offer benefit]
        G --> H[Prepare claim discharge]
        H --> I[Record benefit payment]
        I --> J{ParallelGateway}
        J --> K[Close claim]
        J --> L[Operate outgoing payment]
        K --> M{ParallelGateway}
        L --> M
        M --> N{XORGateway}
        N --> O[Claim handled]
        F -->|claim to be rejected| P[Reject claim]
        P --> Q[Review claim rejection]
        Q --> R{XORGateway}
        R -->|claim rejection not accepted| C
        R -->|claim rejection accepted| O
    end
